mapper.select: SELECT MIMS.COMPANY_CD , MIMS.DIVISION_CD , MIMS.LOCATION_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCATION_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD,MIMS.LOCATION_CD) FROM DUAL) AS LOCATION_NM , MIMS.ITEM_ID , MIMS.UNIT , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MIMS.UNIT AS UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD, MIMS.UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS UOM_NM , MIMS.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH , MIMS.BEGIN_QTY , MIMS.IN_QTY , MIMS.OUT_QTY , MIMS.END_QTY , MIMS.LOCATION_CD || '_' || MIMS.ITEM_ID || '_' || MIMS.UNIT AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_ITEM_INOUT_MONTHLY_SUMMARY MIMS , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_LOCATION ML WHERE MIMS.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MIMS.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MIMS.COMPANY_CD = ML.COMPANY_CD AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = ML.DIVISION_CD AND MIMS.LOCATION_CD = ML.LOCATION_CD AND MIMS.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIMS.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH = #{closeYearMonth, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIMS.LOCATION_CD = #{locationCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIMS.ITEM_ID = #{itemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
